text.value: How many days has been experiencing fever ?
Encourage to continue sleeping under a Long-Lasting Insecticide-treated Net (LLIN) to prevent malaria. It is good for her and safe for the baby.
Has received any Intermittent preventive treatment for malaria (IPTp)?
How many has received so far?
Encourage to seek post abortion care from the nearest health facility.
Educate the on the importance getting an insecticide treated net and encourage her to sleep under it to prevent Malaria
Refer to a health facility to get the treatment
needs to be referred to a health facility immediately. Kindly set a date to follow up on their well being
Remember to add the child(ren) using the new household member form.
Does use LLIN (Long Lasting Insecticide-treated Net?

Still pregnant

Has signs and symptoms consistent with malaria.
Tasks for will stop once you submit this form
Malaria referral and test follow up -
To finish, be sure to click the Submit button.
Majukumu ya yatakoma mara tu utakapowasilisha fomu hii
Ili kumaliza, hakikisha kuwa umebofya kitufe cha Wasilisha.

bind.relevant: selected( /malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/group_malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/has_fever , 'yes') or selected( /malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/group_malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/muscle_pains , 'yes') or selected( /malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/group_malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/severe_headache , 'yes') or selected( /malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/group_malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/vomiting , 'yes') or selected( /malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/group_malaria_assessment_for_pregnant_mothers/tired , 'yes')
